enWisdom: Leniency is the symbol of nobility
Leniency is the symbol of aptness
Gentleness is the brother of a believer
Being lenient with one’s subjects [and dependents] stems from an honourable disposition

Wisdom: الرِّفْقُ مِفْتَاحُ الصَّوَابِ وَشِيمَةُ ذَوِي الْأَلْبَابِ
enWisdom: Leniency is the key to rightness and the trait of the people of understanding

Wisdom: التَّلَطُّفُ فِي الْحِيلَةِ أَجْدَى مِنَ الْوَسِيلَةِ
enWisdom: Being courteous when trying to accomplish something is more effective than other means

Wisdom: اخْلِطِ الشِّدَّةَ بِرِفْقٍ [اخْلُقِ الشِّدَّةَ بِضِغْثٍ مِنَ اللِّينِ‏] وَارْفُقْ مَا كَانَ الرِّفْقُ أَوْفَقَ
enWisdom: Mix sternness with gentleness, and be gentle as long as gentleness is more befitting

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ النَّاسِ أَعْمَلُهُمْ بِالرِّفْقِ وَأَكْيَسُهُمْ أَصْبَرُهُمْ عَلَى الْحَقِّ
enWisdom: The best person is one who deals most gently with others and the most sagacious of them is one who is most persevering on the truth

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ وَتَعَالَى يُحِبُّ السَّهْلَ النَّفْسِ السَّمْحَ الْخَلِيقَةِ الْقَرِيبَ الْأَمْرِ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified and Exalted, loves the person who is approachable [and courteous], of tolerant disposition and prompt in getting things done
When you become the ruler then be kind [to your subjects]
When you punish, be lenient

Wisdom: إِذَا كَانَ الرِّفْقُ خُرْقاً كَانَ الْخُرْقُ رِفْقاً
enWisdom: When leniency is unsuitable, then harshness is lenience
Through leniency, magnanimity is completed
The best of attributes is kindness
The pinnacle of knowledge is leniency [and compassion]

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالرِّفْقِ فَإِنَّهُ مِفْتَاحُ الصَّوَابِ وَسَجِيَّةُ أُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
enWisdom: Adopt leniency, for indeed it is the key to rightness and the quality of the people of understanding

Wisdom: لِكُلِّ دِينٍ خُلُقٌ وَخُلُقُ الْإِيمَانِ الرِّفْقُ
enWisdom: For every religion there is a character and the character of faith is kindness

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ أَحْظَى النَّاسِ عِنْدَكَ أَعْمَلَهُمْ بِالرِّفْقِ
enWisdom: Let the most favoured of people in your sight be the one who is the most lenient in his actions
What a good companion leniency is!
The best quality is employing leniency
Violence and gentleness do not go together
There is no quality more honourable than leniency
What an excellent person the compassionate one is!
